S

setAbout(String) - Method in class com.KDH.platform.Platform
The KDHMain calls this to set the string that is shown when the user chooses "About" from the KDH menu in the upper-right corner of the window.
setHeading(String) - Method in class com.KDH.platform.Console
put the given text at the top of the console, above the region that scrolls
setLastSyncSpeed(int, double) - Method in class com.KDH.platform.Platform
set the speed of the last sync for a given node
setSleepAfterSync(long) - Method in class com.KDH.platform.Platform
Set the number of milliseconds the Platform should delay after each gossip sync it initiates.
setStatsWritePeriod(int) - Method in class com.KDH.platform.Statistics
An app can call this to record how often it plans to save statistics to disk.
Statistics - Class in com.KDH.platform
This class collects and reports various statistics about network operation.
Statistics(Platform) - Constructor for class com.KDH.platform.Statistics
Constructor for a Statistics object that will monitor the statistics for the network for the given Platform.
KDHMain - Interface in com.KDH.platform
To implement a KDH, create a class that implements KDHMain.
KDHtate - Interface in com.KDH.platform
A KDH app is defined by creating two classes, one implementing KDHMain, and the other KDHtate, such that:

KDHtate has a no-argument constructor (called by Platform) All KDHtate variables are thread-safe and private All KDHtate methods are synchronized KDHMain never modifies an object in KDHtate
So, if KDHtate contains an array, and KDHMain gets it through a getter method, then the developer is responsible for making sure KDHMain never changes the contents of that array.
KDHtate.KDHtate2 - Interface in com.KDH.platform
Normally, an app must define a state class that implements KDHtate.
